general.name: DRQ
general.description:
DR12Q is the final quasar catalog of SDSS, associated to the twelfth data release, as documented in PÃ¢ris et al. (2015).

This webpage documents the format of the DR12Q.fits file.
general.naming_convention: migration: not in database. Needs update
general.generated_by: migration: not in database. Needs update

changelog.description: Describes changes to the datamodel product and/or file structure from one release to another

hdu0.name: PRIMARY
hdu0.description:
The data in this primary HDU consists of bytes which
comprise a VOTABLE document.
The VOTable describes the metadata of the table contained
in the following BINTABLE extension.
Such a BINTABLE extension can be used on its own as a perfectly
good table, but the information from this HDU may provide some
useful additional metadata.

header.comment: conforms to FITS standard
array data type
number of array dimensions
length of dimension 1
Table metadata in VOTable format
